SPI_SlaveProfile_t Struct Reference
SPI Driver External Data Structures

SPI slave profile Parameters. More...

#include <drivers/spi/SPI.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t chipSelect
 
uint8_t ramBufLen
 
SPI_DMAChanCfg dmaCfg
 

Detailed Description

SPI slave profile Parameters.

When SPI is configured as master mode, it may connect to multiple slaves. This data structure captures the the configurations for remote slaves.

Field Documentation

uint8_t SPI_SlaveProfile_t::chipSelect

CS0-CS7 signal number from 0 -7

SPI_DMAChanCfg SPI_SlaveProfile_t::dmaCfg

System DMA channel configuration, used when DMA is enabled

uint8_t SPI_SlaveProfile_t::ramBufLen

RAM Length in bytes that used by the slave
